result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing an HTTP client with methods for GET and POST requests, handling responses and errors.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating HTTP client functionality with a focus on separation of concerns and reusability.

httpclient/httpclient.go.purpose: This file implements an HTTP client with methods for GET and POST requests, handling responses and errors.
side_effects: Logs the duration of HTTP requests
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive data in logs if headers or request data contain sensitive information
